content.webTitle: Mittal prepares to launch Arcelor bid tomorrow

fields.headline: Mittal prepares to launch Arcelor bid tomorrow
fields.bodyText: Mittal Steel is ready to launch its 21bn euro (£14bn) hostile bid for European rival Arcelor tomorrow, after winning clearance last night from financial regulators in Belgium, France, Holland and Luxembourg. It said it expected to gain Spanish approval later this week. Its offer, ending a 17-week phoney war with Luxembourg-based Arcelor, which is fighting to retain its independence with a £5bn-plus sweetener to investors, will close on June 29. Lakshmi Mittal, chief executive, said: "Now shareholders will have the opportunity to decide for themselves on the value and merits of our proposal."
